title: Over 150 restaurants complained of booking issue through magicpin platform
description: Magicpin currently has nearly 4000 fine-dining restaurants live on its platform accepting reservations via google reservations and  the company has done over 80,000 table bookings while managing an average of 5,000 reservations on a weekly basis currently.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
